text.text_translated:
This is a common story in scary films. Many scary films had this story. It was very popular in the past, around the year 2000.
The film starts with a group of teenagers. They are having fun. Everyone dies, except one girl.
At first, the girl is usually good. She does not do bad things. She is shy. She is not very strong. Later, she becomes the toughest person. She is very good at knowing how to win. She is the best in the world. The last girl almost always wins.
